name: Headless No Man
description:
A battle for your head. Evil monsters have stolen our head and turns out your not supposed to be alive but you are and they are never giving your head back so you try  fight a but alas you find out that you cannot die you start timing your self and see what the best time you can get. End of Story. This game is a bit buggy so keep that in mind I am only a beginner and I made it in 3 days I will update in the future and so check this website to see the update changes

W - to move forward

 S - to move backwards

 A - to move left

D - to move right

Q - to shoot forwards

E - to shoot backwards

Brag about your High Scores in the comments and I also take feedback so tell me feedback
